title: Agentic AI Adoption Gets Support from Tech Services Companies
optimized_headline: Tech Services Companies Rally Behind Agentic AI Adoption: Here's Why
raw_excerpt: DXC Technology and Boomi have partnered to launch a center of excellence to support customers’ AI rollout
raw_body: DXC Technology and Boomi have partnered to launch a center of excellence to support customers’ AI rollout
speedrun: DXC Technology and Boomi have teamed up to create a center of excellence aimed at helping businesses implement AI solutions more effectively. This initiative focuses on providing guidance and resources for a smoother AI adoption process. By leveraging their expertise, they hope to ease the transition for companies looking to integrate AI into their operations. This partnership is significant as it reflects the growing demand for AI support in various industries.
why_it_matters: Businesses seeking to adopt AI will benefit from expert guidance, streamlining their integration process and reducing potential pitfalls.
This partnership signals a broader trend where tech service companies are increasingly positioning themselves as essential partners in AI adoption across industries.

lenses.eli12: DXC Technology and Boomi are working together to help companies use AI better. Think of it as a training camp for businesses to learn how to use AI tools. This matters because as more companies adopt AI, having the right support can make a big difference in their success.
lenses.pm: For product managers and founders, this collaboration highlights the importance of having reliable partners in AI implementation. It addresses the user need for guidance while potentially reducing costs associated with trial and error. This could lead to more efficient product development cycles and faster market entry.
lenses.engineer: From a technical perspective, the center of excellence will likely focus on best practices for AI deployment, including model selection and integration strategies. Emphasizing collaboration, this initiative could improve the efficiency of AI projects, although specific benchmarks or metrics have not been disclosed in the announcement.
